use_case: Complete business automation for kennel businesses including lead generation, appointment booking, and customer retention
target_audience: Kennel business owners, specialty services professionals
author: Multiple Providers

description.overview: Industry-specific automation system designed for kennel businesses. Includes lead capture funnels, automated follow-up sequences, appointment booking, customer communication workflows, and review generation. Built on proven best practices for the kennel industry.
key_benefits: Pipeline for tracking leads to customers
ideal_for: Kennel businesses wanting to automate operations
New kennel businesses needing a complete system
Established specialty services companies looking to scale

funnels.name: Kennel Quote Request Funnel
funnels.purpose: Collect quote requests and service details

workflows.name: New Lead Welcome Sequence
workflows.purpose: Engage leads immediately with multi-channel outreach

pipelines.name: Kennel Sales Pipeline
pipelines.purpose: Track leads through entire customer journey
